item.description: The Ford Hall Forum (FHF) in downtown Boston offers FREE discussions with great speakers and always gives the audience a chance to ask questions. "From the Government and Here to Help" is a debate between the President of the Ayn Rand Institute and the Co-Founder of Demos on whether we need more or less government. Expect sparks to fly at this riveting exchange! DATE: Thursday, September 29 TIME: 6:30 PM - 8:00 PM PLACE: Suffolk University’s C. Walsh Theatre (downtown) For all of the info, please go to www.fordhallforum.org.

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: Attend "From the Government and Here to Help"
